What are the treatments for Klippel-Feil syndrome ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of Klippel-Feil syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Klippel Feil syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Klippel-Feil syndrome 1, autosomal dominant  - Genetic Testing Registry: Klippel-Feil syndrome 2, autosomal recessive  - Genetic Testing Registry: Klippel-Feil syndrome 3, autosomal dominant   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and manageme
